name: Video Darts
overview: A 2 player pub darts game. The main character Jimmy Riddle (Cockney slang for "piddle" as in having a pee) seems friendly enough, play a few rounds with him. The game included 3 rounds and naturally the player with the highest score wins. Before shooting the dart you must remember to center, using the right lever of the joystick, then fire the button when the arm is forward. Published in Italy as Freccette in Special Program n.22 (maggio 1986) and in Super Game 2000 n.11 (Gennaio 1986).
